titles.title: Catastrophic Coverage Election Act of 1988

A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit individuals to elect not to receive benefits to which such individuals are entitled as a result of the enactment of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 and not to pay premiums imposed pursuant to such Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Catastrophic Coverage Election Act of 1988 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to permit individuals to elect not to receive benefits to which such individuals are entitled as a result of the enactment of the Medicare Catastrophic Coverage Act of 1988 and not to pay premiums imposed pursuant to such Act. Requires that beneficiaries be notified of such option.
